alert.note: Alert for Erie; Ottawa; Sandusky (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 6:49PM EDT until May 03 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Erie County in north central Ohio... Central Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 649 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fremont, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Sandusky, Fremont, Port Clinton, Kelleys Island, Put-In-Bay, Clyde, Oak Harbor, Elmore, Green Springs, Castalia, Ballville, Catawba Island, Marblehead, Bay View, Lindsey, Rocky Ridge, Stony Prairie, Whites Landing and Vickery. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Ohio.
